entry.title: NEOTAD - Dietary Supplement | 20 Sachets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Biomedica Foscama
Type: NEOTAD
Price: 55.00

Key Features:

  • Product Name: NEOTAD Dietary Supplement
  • Form: Sachets
  • Package Size: 20 sachets

Description:
NEOTAD is a premium dietary supplement formulated with reduced L-Glutathione (Setria), Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Selenium. These key ingredients are known for their powerful antioxidant properties: Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Selenium contribute to protecting cells from oxidative stress. Ideal for individuals with limited dietary intake or increased nutritional needs, NEOTAD provides essential support for cellular health and overall well-being.

Ingredients:

  • Fructose
  • Reduced L-Glutathione (Setria)
  • Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid)
  • Sweeteners: Isomalt, Aspartame, Sucralose
  • Grapefruit Flavor
  • Vitamin E (d,l-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate)
  • Anti-caking Agent: Silicon Dioxide
  • Sodium Bicarbonate
  • L-Selenomethionine

Nutritional Values (Per Sachet and % of Recommended Daily Intake):

  • Reduced L-Glutathione (Setria): 250 mg
  • Vitamin C: 250 mg (313% RDI)
  • Vitamin E: 36 mg (300% RDI)
  • Selenium (L-Selenomethionine): 20 mcg (36.4% RDI)

Usage Instructions:
Take one sachet daily. Pour the contents directly into your mouth for fast absorption and convenience.

Important Notes:

  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
  • This product is not a substitute for a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.
  • Excessive consumption may cause a laxative effect.

Storage Instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place away from heat sources. Shelf life: 36 months (unopened).

Package Details:

  • Quantity: 20 sachets
  • Net Weight: 40 g

Why Choose NEOTAD?
NEOTAD is the ultimate choice for supporting your health with a powerful blend of antioxidants and essential nutrients. Designed to protect your cells and enhance overall vitality, it’s a smart addition to your daily wellness routine.

entry.title: Buy HCG Choriomon 5000 IU | Viel
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: HCG Choriomon 5000 IU | Viel
Price: 47.00

All products are shipped in a cooler box at an appropriate temperature.

What is HCG Choriomon 5000 IU?

HCG Choriomon 5000 is a hormone used in medicine to diagnose pregnancy and treat certain conditions. It is also beneficial for athletes and bodybuilders to increase muscle mass. If you’re searching for information on choriomon 5000 price, it’s essential to understand its benefits and applications.

HCG Choriomon 5000 is a pharmaceutical product containing the hormone human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG). HCG is a hormone produced by the placenta during pregnancy and plays a crucial role in the body. In medicine, HCG Choriomon 5000 is used to treat hypogonadism and cryptorchidism in men with low testosterone levels. In women, this hormone helps maintain ovarian follicles.

HCG stimulates testosterone production in men and estrogen production in women, offering various positive effects on the body and human organism. It aids in increasing sperm levels in men and stimulates ovulation in women.

What are the benefits of HCG Choriomon 5000?

Before evaluating the choriomon 5000 price, consider its wide-ranging benefits for health and fitness:

  • Stimulates testosterone production in men, enhancing sexual function and helping to maintain muscle mass.
  • Promotes the growth of new muscle cells, aiding in muscle mass increase.
  • Improves muscular endurance by increasing muscle size.
  • Stimulates the growth of new blood vessels, improving cardiovascular function.
  • Reduces depression and anxiety, improving mood.
  • Accelerates metabolism, leading to faster fat reduction.
  • Improves sleep quality by facilitating faster and more restful sleep, while reducing stress and anxiety.
  • Speeds up recovery after training and physical exertion.
  • Enhances immune function by participating in T-cell production.
  • Improves fertility in women.
  • Enhances sperm quality in men.
  • Helps treat conditions like cryptorchidism and hypogonadism and alleviates certain types of cancer-related conditions.

HCG Choriomon 5000 IU in sports

HCG Choriomon 5000 (Human Chorionic Gonadotropin) can be used in sports for various purposes:

  • Restoring normal testosterone levels: Steroid cycles may suppress the body’s natural testosterone production. HCG is used post-cycle to restore normal testosterone levels.
  • Aiding in muscle mass building: HCG can help increase muscle mass and strength, facilitating anabolic processes in the body.
  • Boosting energy: Increased testosterone levels achieved with HCG intake can contribute to higher energy and overall athletic performance.
  • Preserving muscle mass during weight loss: In some cases, HCG is used to maintain muscle mass during weight-loss diets, preventing muscle tissue loss.

Different countries have different rules and restrictions regarding the use of HCG in sports, and its use may be prohibited in certain sports or organizations. It is essential to follow sports organization rules and consult a specialist before starting HCG or similar substances.

Appropriate dosage and administration of HCG Choriomon 5000 : 

The dosage and administration of HCG Choriomon (Human Chorionic Gonadotropin) depend on various factors, including the treatment purpose, individual needs, and the person’s health status.

Typically, Choriomon 5000 is administered via injections, either into muscles or subcutaneous fat. The recommended dosage is generally 5000 IU per week, but it can vary based on the treatment purpose and individual requirements.

For medical therapy of specific conditions, the dosage may vary depending on what is being treated.

Possible side effects of HCG Choriomon :

HCG Choriomon is an effective pharmaceutical product for inducing ovulation in women and treating certain conditions in men. Like any such product, it may cause some side effects.

The most common side effects of using HCG Choriomon include pain at the injection site, headaches, and breast tenderness. These side effects usually occur when the recommended dosage is not followed.

When taken at the recommended dose and duration prescribed by a specialist, HCG-Choriomon 5000 has proven to be effective and safe.

Why choose Pen Peptide?

If you’re looking for competitive choriomon 5000 price options, dtspharmacy.com provides high-quality HCG Choriomon 5000 IU with over 99% purity. Pen Peptide specializes in synthesizing scientifically-researched and highly purified peptides, ensuring top-tier quality. With fast delivery (2 to 5 business days) and peptides produced in certified laboratories, dtspharmacy.com is your trusted source for HCG Choriomon 5000 IU.

entry.title: ISRIB (Nootropic Supplement)
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: ISRIB Nootropic Supplement
Price: 116.00 - 209.00 (2 variants)

What is ISRIB (Integrated Stress Response Inhibitor)?

ISRIB is a breakthrough compound designed to modulate the integrated stress response (ISR) at a cellular level. This innovative approach promotes better cellular functions and offers a range of cognitive and neurological benefits. Backed by cutting-edge research in neurology and psychopharmacology, ISRIB stands out as a game-changing supplement for mental and brain health.

Key features and benefits of ISRIB

  • Enhances Cognitive Functions: ISRIB has shown remarkable potential to improve memory, learning, and focus, making it ideal for those seeking sharper mental clarity and better productivity.
  • Supports Neurological Health: With its ability to influence cellular "repair" mechanisms, ISRIB offers promising applications in managing neurological conditions and promoting brain regeneration.
  • Relieves Stress and Anxiety: Early research suggests ISRIB may help reduce stress and anxiety, paving the way for better mental health management.
  • Antidepressant Properties: Preliminary studies indicate ISRIB’s potential in alleviating symptoms of depression.
  • Advanced Cellular Action: By modulating the ISR pathway, ISRIB enhances cellular resilience and efficiency, supporting overall cognitive health.

Dosage and administration

Prophylactic Use: Take 20 mg daily for 20 days, followed by a break.

Therapeutic Use: Take 60 mg daily as directed by a healthcare professional.

Why choose ISRIB?

Whether you’re seeking to enhance cognitive function, support neurological health, or improve mental well-being, ISRIB offers a science-backed solution with transformative potential. Secure your ISRIB today and unlock a new level of brain health and performance.
